trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= password>" name="<input type= password>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático a HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= password>" name="<input type= password>" href=""> </xref> elemento no servidor.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputPassword class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText> class and is used to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter a password.
trans-unit.target: A classe de HtmlInputPassword é derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>classe e é utilizado para criar uma caixa de texto de linha única que permite ao utilizador introduzir uma palavra-passe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>

trans-unit.source: When using the HtmlInputPassword control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property is posted to the server each time the form is submitted.
trans-unit.target: Ao utilizar o controlo de HtmlInputPassword o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>propriedade é publicada para o servidor de cada vez que o formulário é submetido.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property for the HtmlInputPassword control is not persisted in view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>propriedade HtmlInputPassword controlo não faz persistente na vista de estado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.MaxLength%2A> property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.MaxLength%2A>propriedade especifica o número máximo de carateres que podem ser introduzidos na caixa de texto.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Size%2A> property allows you to specify the width of the text box.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Size%2A>propriedade permite-lhe especificar a largura da caixa de texto.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property to determine the value entered in the text box by the user.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>propriedade para determinar o valor introduzido na caixa de texto, pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputPassword control provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.ServerChange> event that is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de HtmlInputPassword fornece um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.ServerChange>evento que é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>propriedade altera os valores entre pedidos POST para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe criar um processador de eventos que executa um conjunto personalizado de instruções sempre que o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HtmlInputPassword control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > HtmlInputPassword o controlo não fornecer uma forma incorporada publicar novamente para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting back to the server, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> control.
trans-unit.target: Tem de fornecer outro controlo na página Web que suporte a publicar para o servidor, tais como um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputPassword, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de HtmlInputPassword, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword"></xref> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword"> </xref> classe os valores predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword> control using default values.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>controlar os valores predefinidos.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>

trans-unit.source: It creates a `password` type text box control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um `password` tipo de controlo de caixa de texto.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>|The "password" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>| A cadeia de literal "palavra-passe". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: Renders the attributes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword"></xref> control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta os atributos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword"> </xref> controlo especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method removes the `Value` attribute from the view state collection to prevent it from being rendered, and then calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderAttributes remove o `Value` atributo da coleção de estado de vista para impedir que a ser composto e, em seguida, chama a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o conteúdo composto.
